values: The Peculiar Mark of Majesty, Part 2The Peculiar Mark of Majesty, Part 2

We will reign with Christ and find our joy not in usurping God's majesty but in saying: “How majestic is your name in all the earth.”We will reign with Christ and find our joy not in usurping God's majesty but in saying: “How majestic is your name in all the earth.”
